summary: This is a court filing from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York requesting that portions of the sentencing transcript in the case United States v. Rayshaun Jones be sealed. The letter itself is also requested to be filed under seal.

persons.name: Rayshaun Jones
persons.context: Defendant in the criminal case United States v. Rayshaun Jones (13 Cr. 416 (PGG)).

persons.name: Bonita Robinson
persons.context: Appears as a recipient (Cc) of the email, with an email address at sd.uscourts.gov.

persons.name: Rebekah Donaleski
persons.context: Sender of the email and the Assistant United States Attorney making the request to seal the sentencing transcript and the letter.

connections.description: Donaleski, as an AUSA, is prosecuting the case against defendant Rayshaun Jones.

events.title: Request to Seal Sentencing Transcript
events.description: Assistant U.S. Attorney Rebekah Donaleski files a request to seal portions of the sentencing transcript in United States v. Rayshaun Jones.

keyFacts: The document is a request from the U.S. Attorney's Office to seal parts of a sentencing transcript in the case United States v. Rayshaun Jones.
The case number is 13 Cr. 416 (PGG), indicating it is a 2013 criminal case.
The request itself (the letter) is also asked to be filed under seal, suggesting sensitive information.
